snippet: The currency has been in a slide against the dollar since May, when the United States said it might scale back bond purchases and foreign capital began to flee India.
lead_paragraph: The currency has been in a slide against the dollar since May, when the United States said it might scale back bond purchases and foreign capital began to flee India.

headline.main: Indian Rupee Falls to Record Low
headline.print_headline: Indian Rupee Falls to Record Low
